title: Lamar Jackson usage, Josh Allen reps, AFC East strength of schedule (Football 06/14)
description:
CBS NFL writer John Breech joins CBS Senior Fantasy writer Dave Richard to break down their respective biggest minicamp storylines and news coming out of those mandatory sessions being held this week. The guys also discuss expectations for Deshaun Watson as he returns from injury and sheds his knee brace, the Ravens usage of rookie LaMar Jackson, and the possibility of Josh Allen starting Week 1 for the Bills. John and Dave also analyze the AFC East by strength of schedule, each offering their unique formulas to the conversation.
